participant_1.background:
I love to take my horse, Beauty, for rides on the weekends.
i am a great baker.
I love to read about holistic health and natural remedies, so my favorite websites are those that focus on these topics.
i am a house wife.
I like to spend time with my pets because it makes me feel young.

participant_2.background:
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
I'm healthy because I'm responsible with my diet and I get enough sleep.
I've always loved to paint, but I don't think I could do it if I were blind.
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
i like fantasizing.

content.text: Hey there! How's your morning going?
It's going well, thank you for asking! My commute is the best part of my day because I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects. How about you?
My morning is going well, too! I'm looking forward to going horseback riding with my horse, Beauty, later today. She's my best friend and I love spending time with her.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go horseback riding but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a great way to get exercise and fresh air, and it's also really relaxing.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, paint, and bike to the basketball court. I also like to fantasize about being a famous artist.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to read and paint too. I'm not very good at basketball, but I enjoy playing it.
I'm glad to hear that you have some similar hobbies. It's always nice to find someone who enjoys the same things you do.
Me too! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun chatting in the future
